oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: In a peculiar state of the atmosphere, in which sounds can be heard at a considerable distance, sitting, instead of standing, is recommended; for fear of evil consequences. Standing over those who are sitting, on account of its injurious effects, is also objected to, etc. In the Katkop dialect, by D !kw in (L V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !ho The
